source_id: STP1023-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_8th Volume_021_chunk1
evidence_span: Out-of-reactor corrosion tests in 10.3-MPa steam at temperatures between 490 and $5 3 0 \%$ have been carried out on Zircaloy-2 tube specimens
